changeSet.author: Household_table
changeSet.sql:
create table household ( id bigint auto_increment, number_of_members int, rooms_count int, part_of_room char(100), has_foreign_residents bool, has_farm_facilities bool,
constraint id_pk primary key (id) );

changeSet.author: AccommodationsInfo_table
changeSet.sql:
create table accommodations_info ( linked_household_id bigint,
owner_of_apartment int, is_apartment_rented bool, apartment_type int, area_of_flat float, water_pipes int, canalization int, has_bath_or_shower bool, hot_water_supply int, heating int, cooking_equipment int );

changeSet.author: FullAddressInfo_table
changeSet.sql:
create table full_address_info ( linked_household_id bigint,
city varchar(100), city_district varchar(100), region varchar(100), region_district varchar(100), village_council varchar(100), village_name varchar(100), street_avenue_other varchar(100), house_number varchar(100), owner_fio varchar(100), frame_number varchar(100), flat_or_room_number varchar(100) );

changeSet.author: Person_table
changeSet.sql:
create table person ( id bigint auto_increment, id_household bigint,
is_foreign bool, home_country varchar(100), reason_for_migration int,
p_name varchar(100), p_surname varchar(100), p_fathername varchar(100), passport_id varchar(100), birthday_date date, age int, gender int, household_relations int, marital_status int, birth_country int, name_of_birth_country varchar(100), citizenship int, name_of_citizenship_country varchar(100), nationality int, name_of_nationality varchar(100), native_language int, name_of_native_language varchar(100), speaking_language int, name_of_speaking_language varchar(100), main_source_of_resources int,
constraint id_pk primary key (id), constraint id_person_household_fk foreign key (id_household) references household (id) );

changeSet.author: LivingPlaceInfo_table
changeSet.sql:
create table living_place_info ( linked_person_id bigint,
do_you_live_here_from_birth bool, arrival_period date, previous_living_place int, region_or_district_name varchar(100), city_or_pgt_name varchar(100), is_it_village bool, name_of_previous_country varchar(100), reason_for_arrival_at_place int );

changeSet.author: LivingCountryInfo_table
changeSet.sql:
create table living_country_info ( linked_person_id bigint,
did_you_live_in_other_country bool, name_of_country_you_came_from varchar(100), arrival_period date, reason_for_arrival_at_rb int, info_about_leaving_belarus int, reason_for_leaving_belarus int );

changeSet.author: EducationInfo_table
changeSet.sql:
create table education_info ( linked_person_id bigint,
lvl_of_education int, academic_degree int, can_you_read_and_write bool, basic_education_info int, additional_education_info bool, does_child_attend_preschool bool );

changeSet.author: WorkInfo_table
changeSet.sql:
create table work_info ( linked_person_id bigint,
do_you_have_work bool, why_didnt_you_work_till_now bool, location_of_work int, region_or_district_name varchar(100), city_or_pgt_name varchar(100), is_it_village bool, name_of_country varchar(100), departure_frequency_to_work int, unemployment_reason int, type_of_workplace int, type_of_work_position int, did_you_looked_for_a_job bool, can_you_star_working_in_two_weeks bool, why_you_cant_work_or_stopped_search int );

changeSet.author: ChildrenInfo_table
changeSet.sql:
create table children_info ( linked_person_id bigint,
how_many_children_do_you_have int, no_children bool, children_plans int, how_many_children_do_you_want int, dont_know_how_many bool );
